DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Patient End Follow-up Request Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the request of the healthcare organization, directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study, to end or terminate the monitoring of a person's health over time after treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Patient End Follow-up Request
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the request of the healthcare organization, directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study, to end or terminate the monitoring of a person's health over time after treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.:The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.:Express the need or desire for; ask for.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The point or place at which something terminates in time, space, or extent.

The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.
Express the need or desire for; ask for.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of site request to terminate patient follow-up

DataElement.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form
